mapper.sql: id, name, card, district_id, phone, qq, address, des, create_time, create_method, update_time, update_method
mapper.select:
select count(id) totle from registration where district_id = #{districtId}
and create_time between DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select
from registration
id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'),
and card=#{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and districtId=#{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and qq=#{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and address=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and des=#{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and createTime=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and createMethod=#{createMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and updateTime=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and updateMethod=#{updateMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.insert: insert into registration (id, name, card, district_id, phone, qq, address, des, create_time, create_method, update_time, update_method ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update registration
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
